turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I am really craving a coffee from the Starbucks in Lexington Kentucky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I could pick you up something on my way over.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you? That would be great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, just tell me what you want!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am down between two, give me just a second.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing; they have so many options it can be tough to pick just one!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It sure can! I think I am gonna go with the Black and White Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My sister gets that one all the time, good choice!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks; make it a tall with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whip cream please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea I don't ever get whip cream myself.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There is just something about it that always gives my drink an odd flavor.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, I know what you mean!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate you ordering my coffee for me!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is my pleasure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing gets my day going more than a cup of coffee from Starbucks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Mine either! I would be lost without the burst it gives me!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know what you mean!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been placed and you should have your coffee soon!
